English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediaworkshopparticipantsamazedbyNanjing’shigh-techindustryBeihai:arisinghubofelectronicinformationindustryOver60percentofyoungstersafraidtolookatmedexaminationreportsforfearofbadnewsShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationCarbrandsoptimisticaboutprospectsofChina'se-carindustryMostViewedDay/Week1ViciouspracticeofU.S.willcertainlyb…2XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestini…3PLAgarrisonlaudedforsafeguardingHong…4Xistressescultivatingnewtypeofmilit…5Chinaisnotofferingmoreinternational…1ViciouspracticeofU.S.willcertainlybec…2Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHong…3NoforcecanstopChinafromgrowingstronge…4Hereishow5Gwillchangethefuture5TurnoutsetsrecordinHKdistrictvotingLatestNewsChina'snon-manufacturingPMIrisesinNovemberChina'smanufacturingPMIedgesupinNovemberLocalgovernmentmakeseffortstodeveloppanaxnotoginsengindustryinYunnanVillagesbecomepopulartourismdestinationsincentralChina'sHenanGiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiChina,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationTradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessFathergetsdeathforkillingstudentVideo:WeAreChinaColumnistIssettingamanonfiretheso-called'beautifulsighttobehold'thatPelosidescribed?SocietyFathergetsdeathforkillingstudentLocalgovernmentmakeseffortstodeveloppanaxnotoginsengindustryinYunnanFathergetsdeathforkillingstudentConstructionofeachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedNationalSeminarheldtodiscussinternationalhumanitariancooperation,exchangesChina,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationWashington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsBusinessCarbrandsoptimisticaboutprospectsofChina'se-carindustryChina'snon-manufacturingPMIrisesinNovemberChina'smanufacturingPMIedgesupinNovemberTradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessWorld2killedinLondonBridgeknifeattack,patrolstobebeefedup:policeTradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusiness2killedinLondonBridgeknifeattack,patrolstobebeefedup:policeFormerJapanesePrimeMinisterNakasonediesaged101MilitaryChina,PakistantoholdjointmaritimedrillChina,PakistantoholdjointmaritimedrillChinesenavalwarshipopentopublicduringmaritimeexerciseinS.AfricaS.AfricannavyhostsRussia,ChinaformaritimeexerciseScience&TechBeihai:arisinghubofelectronicinformationindustryAstronauts'healthseenascorepartofspacestationtechChinaplansnewmeteorologicalsatellitesResearchersdevelopself-poweredsmarttabletennistableSportsHighlightsofSnookerUKChampionship2019firstroundmatchesChinamullsincludinghigh-qualitysportsindustrydevelopmentinnewfive-'sHenanGiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiLife&HealthOver60percentofyoungstersafraidtolookatmedexaminationreportsforfearofbadnewsExpertswarnincreasedpossibilityofheartattackinwinterFDAapprovesChinese-developedanti-cancerdrugU.S.scientistsidentifynewHIVstrain,firstinnearly20yearsTravelSceneryofShilinsceniczoneinSWChina'sYunnanShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationSceneryofShilinsceniczoneinSWChina'sYunnanHolidayTrainShowheldinNewYorkFeaturedReportsInfographics:Chinain70yearsDocumentary:TheHistoricJourneyofP.R.ChinaWorksof'@China'GlobalShortVideoContestAmazingChinaChinain24hours60YearsofDemocraticReforminTibetHeartTouchingStoriesGodsentPu'erChinaandtheWorldTradeOrganizationChangsha,avigorouscityNewsofCPCWashington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsSeminarheldtodiscussinternationalhumanitariancooperation,exchangesXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamCPCleadershipdiscussesrulesforgrassrootsPartyorganizationsinPartyandstatebodies,SOEsAnother19impoverishedareastobedelistedinTibetLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnlineFollowusonWeChatFollowusonWeiboPrivacyStatementBycontinuingtobrowseoursite,youagreetoourpriva shopparticipantsamazedbyNanjing’shigh-techindustryBeihai:arisinghubofelectronicinformationindustryOver60percentofyoungstersafraidtolookatmedexaminationreportsforfearofbadnewsShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationCarbrandsoptimisticaboutprospectsofChina'se-carindustryMostViewedDay/Week1ViciouspracticeofU.S.willcertainlyb…2XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestini…3PLAgarrisonlaudedforsafeguardingHong…4Xistressescultivatingnewtypeofmilit…5Chinaisnotofferingmoreinternational…1ViciouspracticeofU.S.willcertainlybec…2Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHong…3NoforcecanstopChinafromgrowingstronge…4Hereishow5Gwillchangethefuture5TurnoutsetsrecordinHKdistrictvotingLatestNewsChina'snon-manufacturingPMIrisesinNovemberChina'smanufacturingPMIedgesupinNovemberLocalgovernmentmakeseffortstodeveloppanaxnotoginsengindustryinYunnanVillagesbecomepopulartourismdestinationsincentralChina'sHenanGiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiChina,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationTradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessFathergetsdeathforkillingstudentVideo:WeAreChinaColumnistIssettingamanonfiretheso-called'beautifulsighttobehold'thatPelosidescribed?SocietyFathergetsdeathforkillingstudentLocalgovernmentmakeseffortstodeveloppanaxnotoginsengindustryinYunnanFathergetsdeathforkillingstudentConstructionofeachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedNationalSeminarheldtodiscussinternationalhumanitariancooperation,exchangesChina,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationWashington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsBusinessCarbrandsoptimisticaboutprospectsofChina'se-carindustryChina'snon-manufacturingPMIrisesinNovemberChina'smanufacturingPMIedgesupinNovemberTradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessWorld2killedinLondonBridgeknifeattack,patrolstobebeefedup:policeTradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusiness2killedinLondonBridgeknifeattack,patrolstobebeefedup:policeFormerJapanesePrim English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork English--People'sDailyOnlineSaturday,Nov30,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoXiFocus:NotoneleftbehindinpursuitofChineseDreamChinahasbeenconstantlypushingforwarditsmedicalreformtoguaranteeeveryoneeasyaccesstomedicalresourcesandabetterqualityoflife.ShibadongVillage:ParadigmforChina'stargetedpovertyalleviationAvillageoftheMiaoethnicgroupincentralChina'sHunanProvincehassetamodelforthenation’stargetedpovertyalleviationefforts.Washington'shegemonicthuggeryonHongKongonlyamockeryofhumanrightsWashington'ssigningoftheactintolawisanakedhegemonicmovethatwillonlydiscredititselfandbringallChinesepeopleclosertogether.China,RussiatoholdmeetingsonsecuritycooperationRussianSecurityCouncilSecretaryNikolaiPatrushevwillvisitChinafromDec.1to4toco-chairthe15throundofChina-Russiastrategicsecurityconsultation.BRIinvolvesinthejourneyofRwanda’sdevelopmentMynameisFrederickByumvuhoreandIamaRwandanjournalistworkingforTheNewTimesnewspaperinmycountry,knownasthelandofathousandhills.TradewarcastsshadowonBlackFridaybusinessBlackFriday,whichfellonNovember29thisyear,remainsthebusiestshoppingdayforUSretailers.Butwhilesaleswereup,theremaybeamixedfeeling,asthetariffstheUSimposedonChinahaveslashedtheirprofits.People’sDailyOnlineseeksEnglishcopy-editorsTheopeningisbasedinPeople’sDailyNewMediaTower,Beijing.Thepositionscomewithaminimumone-yearcontract.GiantpandaseatbambooduringsnowfallatzooinQinghaiSnowfallsinBeijingDonaldTuskhandsoverEuropeanCounciltoCharlesMichelEachstationalongBeijing-Zhangjiakouhigh-speedrailwaytobecompletedOpinionsExclusiveCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsTheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendshipWhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillWorkingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaLivevideostreamingliftsincomesofChinesefarmersSecondBRNNmediawork Opinion--People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;OpinionOpinionsCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsBEIJING,Nov.28(Xinhua)--Thesigningofthelegislationoftheso-calledHongKongHumanRights[Read&nbsp;it]TheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendship"TheUnitedStateshaswarnedPakistanofthelong-termriskstoitseconomyifitembracesChina’s[Read&nbsp;it]WhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?ThedevelopmentmodelofthePeople’sRepublicofChinatodayhasbecomeablueprintfordevelopment[Read&nbsp;it]TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillTheUSCongresspassedtheso-calledHongKongHumanRightsandDemocracyActof2019recentlyinan[Read&nbsp;it]Workingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaItisnecessarytoanalyzethecurrenteconomicdevelopmentinChinafromadialecticalapproachand[Read&nbsp;it]ViciouspracticeofU.S.willcertainlybecondemnedbytheinternationalcommunityItisappallingthatradicalriotershaveresortedtoviolencetocommitcrimesandcausechaosinH[Read&nbsp;it]&nbsp;1&nbsp;2&nbsp;3&nbsp;4&nbsp;5&nbsp;&nbsp;NextMostViewedDay|Week|Month1XistressesimplementingmajormeasuresofkeyCPCsession2ViciouspracticeofU.S.willcertainlybecondemnedbythe…3Chinaisnotofferingmoreinternationalassistancethanit…4Li:New5-YearPlantofocusongrowth5Xistressescultivatingnewtypeofmilitarypersonnel1WhyisChinaslum-free?2HiIamChina:diversifiedGansu3Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps4Blockchaintoimproveconsumerprotectionincross-bordere…5Commentary:HongKongbillwilleventuallybringdisgracet…1CIIEinvitescountriestogetonboardtheexpresstrainof…28reasonswhylifeinChinaissogreat3TCMtogoglobalandbenefitmore4Changsha:fromcapitalofengineeringmachinerytoChina’s…5AnautumnwalkinBaiwangshanForestParkFeaturedReportsInfographics:Chinain70yearsDocumentary:TheHistoricJourneyofP.R.ChinaLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimes Opinion--People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;OpinionOpinionsCommentary:Chinawon'tbeintimidatedbyWashington'sinterferenceinHongKongaffairsBEIJING,Nov.28(Xinhua)--Thesigningofthelegislationoftheso-calledHongKongHumanRights[Read&nbsp;it]TheU.S.warningmayfurthercementourtraditionalfriendship"TheUnitedStateshaswarnedPakistanofthelong-termriskstoitseconomyifitembracesChina’s[Read&nbsp;it]WhatcanwelearnfromChina’sdevelopment?ThedevelopmentmodelofthePeople’sRepublicofChinatodayhasbecomeablueprintfordevelopment[Read&nbsp;it]TostopviolenceandchaosinHongKongisthepopularwillTheUSCongresspassedtheso-calledHongKongHumanRightsandDemocracyActof2019recentlyinan[Read&nbsp;it]Workingtoensurelong-termeconomicstabilityofChinaItisnecessarytoanalyzethecurrenteconomicdevelopmentinChinafromadialecticalapproachand[Read&nbsp;it]ViciouspracticeofU.S.willcertainlybecondemnedbytheinternationalcommunityItisappallingthatradicalriotershaveresortedtoviolencetocommitcrimesandcausechaosinH[Read&nbsp;it]&nbsp;1&nbsp;2&nbsp;3&nbsp;4&nbsp;5&nbsp;&nbsp;NextMostViewedDay|Week|Month1XistressesimplementingmajormeasuresofkeyCPCsession2ViciouspracticeofU.S.willcertainlybecondemnedbythe…3Chinaisnotofferingmoreinternationalassistancethanit…4Li:New5-YearPlantofocusongrowth5Xistressescultivatingnewtypeofmilitarypersonnel1WhyisChinaslum-free?2HiIamChina:diversifiedGansu3Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps4Blockchaintoimproveconsumerprotectionincross-bordere…5Commentary:HongKongbillwilleventuallybringdisgracet…1CIIEinvitescountriestogetonboardtheexpresstrainof…28reasonswhylifeinChinaissogreat3TCMtogoglobalandbenefitmore4Changsha:fromcapitalofengineeringmachinerytoChina’s…5AnautumnwalkinBaiwangshanForestParkFeaturedReportsInfographics:Chinain70yearsDocumentary:TheHistoricJourneyofP.R.ChinaLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimes XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue(ChinaDaily)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:39,November29,2019PresidentXiJinpingcalledonWednesdayforacomprehensiveandjustresolutionofthePalestinianissue,sayingitisatthecoreoftheMiddleEastissue.XimadetheremarkinacongratulatorymessagedeliveredtoacommemorativeeventheldbytheUnitedNationsatitsheadquartersinNewYorktoobservetheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeople.ResolvingtheissueandhelpingPalestineandIsraelachievepeacefulcoexistenceandcommondevelopmentservetheinterestsoftheinternationalcommunity,Xisaid.Hecalledontheinternationalcommunitytosafeguardfairnessandjustice,upholdrelevantUNresolutionsaswellasthe"land-for-peace"principleandthetwo-statesolutionsoastocreateanatmosphereconducivetotheresumptionofPalestinian-Israelipeacetalks.China,asagoodfriend,partnerandbrotherofthePalestinianpeople,isastaunchsupporterofPalestine-Israelpeace,thepresidentstressed.HesaidChinasupportsthejustcauseofthePalestinianpeopletorestoretheirlegitimatenationalrights,andsupportsPalestineinbuildinganindependentandfullysovereignstateonthebasisofthe1967bordersandwithEastJerusalemasitscapital.ChinaisreadytotirelesslyworkwiththeinternationalcommunitytopushforwardPalestine-Israelpeacetalksandstriveforanearlyrealizationofcomprehensive,justandsustainedpeaceintheMiddleEast,Xiadded.TheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeopleisaUN-organizedobservancepursuanttotheUNGeneralAssemblyResolution32/40BofDec2,1977.ItisnormallyheldonNov29eachyeartomarktheadoptionbytheUNGeneralAssemblyofResolution181(II)onNov29,1947,partitioningthemandateofPalestineintotwostates.ThatresolutionprovidedfortheestablishmentinPalestineofa"Jewishstate"andan"Arabstate",withJerusalemunderaspecialinternationalregime.Ofthetwostatestobecreatedunderthisresolution,onlyone,Israel,hasbeenfullyrealized.&nbsp;(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.RelatedreadingXiofferscongratulationsonobservanceofint'ldayofsolidaritywithPalestinianpeoplePalestineslamsTrump'srecognitionofIsrael'ssovereigntyoverGolanas&quot;boosttocolonialism&quot;WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue(ChinaDaily)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:39,November29,2019PresidentXiJinpingcalledonWednesdayforacomprehensiveandjustresolutionofthePalestinianissue,sayingitisatthecoreoftheMiddleEastissue.XimadetheremarkinacongratulatorymessagedeliveredtoacommemorativeeventheldbytheUnitedNationsatitsheadquartersinNewYorktoobservetheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeople.ResolvingtheissueandhelpingPalestineandIsraelachievepeacefulcoexistenceandcommondevelopmentservetheinterestsoftheinternationalcommunity,Xisaid.Hecalledontheinternationalcommunitytosafeguardfairnessandjustice,upholdrelevantUNresolutionsaswellasthe"land-for-peace"principleandthetwo-statesolutionsoastocreateanatmosphereconducivetotheresumptionofPalestinian-Israelipeacetalks.China,asagoodfriend,partnerandbrotherofthePalestinianpeople,isastaunchsupporterofPalestine-Israelpeace,thepresidentstressed.HesaidChinasupportsthejustcauseofthePalestinianpeopletorestoretheirlegitimatenationalrights,andsupportsPalestineinbuildinganindependentandfullysovereignstateonthebasisofthe1967bordersandwithEastJerusalemasitscapital.ChinaisreadytotirelesslyworkwiththeinternationalcommunitytopushforwardPalestine-Israelpeacetalksandstriveforanearlyrealizationofcomprehensive,justandsustainedpeaceintheMiddleEast,Xiadded.TheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeopleisaUN-organizedobservancepursuanttotheUNGeneralAssemblyResolution32/40BofDec2,1977.ItisnormallyheldonNov29eachyeartomarktheadoptionbytheUNGeneralAssemblyofResolution181(II)onNov29,1947,partitioningthemandateofPalestineintotwostates.ThatresolutionprovidedfortheestablishmentinPalestineofa"Jewishstate"andan"Arabstate",withJerusalemunderaspecialinternationalregime.Ofthetwostatestobecreatedunderthisresolution,onlyone,Israel,hasbeenfullyrealized.&nbsp;(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.RelatedreadingXiofferscongratulationsonobservanceofint'ldayofsolidaritywithPalestinianpeoplePalestineslamsTrump'srecognitionofIsrael'ssovereigntyoverGolanas&quot;boosttocolonialism&quot;WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue(ChinaDaily)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:39,November29,2019PresidentXiJinpingcalledonWednesdayforacomprehensiveandjustresolutionofthePalestinianissue,sayingitisatthecoreoftheMiddleEastissue.XimadetheremarkinacongratulatorymessagedeliveredtoacommemorativeeventheldbytheUnitedNationsatitsheadquartersinNewYorktoobservetheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeople.ResolvingtheissueandhelpingPalestineandIsraelachievepeacefulcoexistenceandcommondevelopmentservetheinterestsoftheinternationalcommunity,Xisaid.Hecalledontheinternationalcommunitytosafeguardfairnessandjustice,upholdrelevantUNresolutionsaswellasthe"land-for-peace"principleandthetwo-statesolutionsoastocreateanatmosphereconducivetotheresumptionofPalestinian-Israelipeacetalks.China,asagoodfriend,partnerandbrotherofthePalestinianpeople,isastaunchsupporterofPalestine-Israelpeace,thepresidentstressed.HesaidChinasupportsthejustcauseofthePalestinianpeopletorestoretheirlegitimatenationalrights,andsupportsPalestineinbuildinganindependentandfullysovereignstateonthebasisofthe1967bordersandwithEastJerusalemasitscapital.ChinaisreadytotirelesslyworkwiththeinternationalcommunitytopushforwardPalestine-Israelpeacetalksandstriveforanearlyrealizationofcomprehensive,justandsustainedpeaceintheMiddleEast,Xiadded.TheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeopleisaUN-organizedobservancepursuanttotheUNGeneralAssemblyResolution32/40BofDec2,1977.ItisnormallyheldonNov29eachyeartomarktheadoptionbytheUNGeneralAssemblyofResolution181(II)onNov29,1947,partitioningthemandateofPalestineintotwostates.ThatresolutionprovidedfortheestablishmentinPalestineofa"Jewishstate"andan"Arabstate",withJerusalemunderaspecialinternationalregime.Ofthetwostatestobecreatedunderthisresolution,onlyone,Israel,hasbeenfullyrealized.&nbsp;(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.RelatedreadingXiofferscongratulationsonobservanceofint'ldayofsolidaritywithPalestinianpeoplePalestineslamsTrump'srecognitionofIsrael'ssovereigntyoverGolanas&quot;boosttocolonialism&quot;WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue(ChinaDaily)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:39,November29,2019PresidentXiJinpingcalledonWednesdayforacomprehensiveandjustresolutionofthePalestinianissue,sayingitisatthecoreoftheMiddleEastissue.XimadetheremarkinacongratulatorymessagedeliveredtoacommemorativeeventheldbytheUnitedNationsatitsheadquartersinNewYorktoobservetheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeople.ResolvingtheissueandhelpingPalestineandIsraelachievepeacefulcoexistenceandcommondevelopmentservetheinterestsoftheinternationalcommunity,Xisaid.Hecalledontheinternationalcommunitytosafeguardfairnessandjustice,upholdrelevantUNresolutionsaswellasthe"land-for-peace"principleandthetwo-statesolutionsoastocreateanatmosphereconducivetotheresumptionofPalestinian-Israelipeacetalks.China,asagoodfriend,partnerandbrotherofthePalestinianpeople,isastaunchsupporterofPalestine-Israelpeace,thepresidentstressed.HesaidChinasupportsthejustcauseofthePalestinianpeopletorestoretheirlegitimatenationalrights,andsupportsPalestineinbuildinganindependentandfullysovereignstateonthebasisofthe1967bordersandwithEastJerusalemasitscapital.ChinaisreadytotirelesslyworkwiththeinternationalcommunitytopushforwardPalestine-Israelpeacetalksandstriveforanearlyrealizationofcomprehensive,justandsustainedpeaceintheMiddleEast,Xiadded.TheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeopleisaUN-organizedobservancepursuanttotheUNGeneralAssemblyResolution32/40BofDec2,1977.ItisnormallyheldonNov29eachyeartomarktheadoptionbytheUNGeneralAssemblyofResolution181(II)onNov29,1947,partitioningthemandateofPalestineintotwostates.ThatresolutionprovidedfortheestablishmentinPalestineofa"Jewishstate"andan"Arabstate",withJerusalemunderaspecialinternationalregime.Ofthetwostatestobecreatedunderthisresolution,onlyone,Israel,hasbeenfullyrealized.&nbsp;(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.RelatedreadingXiofferscongratulationsonobservanceofint'ldayofsolidaritywithPalestinianpeoplePalestineslamsTrump'srecognitionofIsrael'ssovereigntyoverGolanas&quot;boosttocolonialism&quot;WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue(ChinaDaily)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:39,November29,2019PresidentXiJinpingcalledonWednesdayforacomprehensiveandjustresolutionofthePalestinianissue,sayingitisatthecoreoftheMiddleEastissue.XimadetheremarkinacongratulatorymessagedeliveredtoacommemorativeeventheldbytheUnitedNationsatitsheadquartersinNewYorktoobservetheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeople.ResolvingtheissueandhelpingPalestineandIsraelachievepeacefulcoexistenceandcommondevelopmentservetheinterestsoftheinternationalcommunity,Xisaid.Hecalledontheinternationalcommunitytosafeguardfairnessandjustice,upholdrelevantUNresolutionsaswellasthe"land-for-peace"principleandthetwo-statesolutionsoastocreateanatmosphereconducivetotheresumptionofPalestinian-Israelipeacetalks.China,asagoodfriend,partnerandbrotherofthePalestinianpeople,isastaunchsupporterofPalestine-Israelpeace,thepresidentstressed.HesaidChinasupportsthejustcauseofthePalestinianpeopletorestoretheirlegitimatenationalrights,andsupportsPalestineinbuildinganindependentandfullysovereignstateonthebasisofthe1967bordersandwithEastJerusalemasitscapital.ChinaisreadytotirelesslyworkwiththeinternationalcommunitytopushforwardPalestine-Israelpeacetalksandstriveforanearlyrealizationofcomprehensive,justandsustainedpeaceintheMiddleEast,Xiadded.TheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeopleisaUN-organizedobservancepursuanttotheUNGeneralAssemblyResolution32/40BofDec2,1977.ItisnormallyheldonNov29eachyeartomarktheadoptionbytheUNGeneralAssemblyofResolution181(II)onNov29,1947,partitioningthemandateofPalestineintotwostates.ThatresolutionprovidedfortheestablishmentinPalestineofa"Jewishstate"andan"Arabstate",withJerusalemunderaspecialinternationalregime.Ofthetwostatestobecreatedunderthisresolution,onlyone,Israel,hasbeenfullyrealized.&nbsp;(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.RelatedreadingXiofferscongratulationsonobservanceofint'ldayofsolidaritywithPalestinianpeoplePalestineslamsTrump'srecognitionofIsrael'ssovereigntyoverGolanas&quot;boosttocolonialism&quot;WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue(ChinaDaily)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:39,November29,2019PresidentXiJinpingcalledonWednesdayforacomprehensiveandjustresolutionofthePalestinianissue,sayingitisatthecoreoftheMiddleEastissue.XimadetheremarkinacongratulatorymessagedeliveredtoacommemorativeeventheldbytheUnitedNationsatitsheadquartersinNewYorktoobservetheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeople.ResolvingtheissueandhelpingPalestineandIsraelachievepeacefulcoexistenceandcommondevelopmentservetheinterestsoftheinternationalcommunity,Xisaid.Hecalledontheinternationalcommunitytosafeguardfairnessandjustice,upholdrelevantUNresolutionsaswellasthe"land-for-peace"principleandthetwo-statesolutionsoastocreateanatmosphereconducivetotheresumptionofPalestinian-Israelipeacetalks.China,asagoodfriend,partnerandbrotherofthePalestinianpeople,isastaunchsupporterofPalestine-Israelpeace,thepresidentstressed.HesaidChinasupportsthejustcauseofthePalestinianpeopletorestoretheirlegitimatenationalrights,andsupportsPalestineinbuildinganindependentandfullysovereignstateonthebasisofthe1967bordersandwithEastJerusalemasitscapital.ChinaisreadytotirelesslyworkwiththeinternationalcommunitytopushforwardPalestine-Israelpeacetalksandstriveforanearlyrealizationofcomprehensive,justandsustainedpeaceintheMiddleEast,Xiadded.TheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeopleisaUN-organizedobservancepursuanttotheUNGeneralAssemblyResolution32/40BofDec2,1977.ItisnormallyheldonNov29eachyeartomarktheadoptionbytheUNGeneralAssemblyofResolution181(II)onNov29,1947,partitioningthemandateofPalestineintotwostates.ThatresolutionprovidedfortheestablishmentinPalestineofa"Jewishstate"andan"Arabstate",withJerusalemunderaspecialinternationalregime.Ofthetwostatestobecreatedunderthisresolution,onlyone,Israel,hasbeenfullyrealized.&nbsp;(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.RelatedreadingXiofferscongratulationsonobservanceofint'ldayofsolidaritywithPalestinianpeoplePalestineslamsTrump'srecognitionofIsrael'ssovereigntyoverGolanas&quot;boosttocolonialism&quot;WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;XicallsforjustresolutionofPalestinianissue(ChinaDaily)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:39,November29,2019PresidentXiJinpingcalledonWednesdayforacomprehensiveandjustresolutionofthePalestinianissue,sayingitisatthecoreoftheMiddleEastissue.XimadetheremarkinacongratulatorymessagedeliveredtoacommemorativeeventheldbytheUnitedNationsatitsheadquartersinNewYorktoobservetheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeople.ResolvingtheissueandhelpingPalestineandIsraelachievepeacefulcoexistenceandcommondevelopmentservetheinterestsoftheinternationalcommunity,Xisaid.Hecalledontheinternationalcommunitytosafeguardfairnessandjustice,upholdrelevantUNresolutionsaswellasthe"land-for-peace"principleandthetwo-statesolutionsoastocreateanatmosphereconducivetotheresumptionofPalestinian-Israelipeacetalks.China,asagoodfriend,partnerandbrotherofthePalestinianpeople,isastaunchsupporterofPalestine-Israelpeace,thepresidentstressed.HesaidChinasupportsthejustcauseofthePalestinianpeopletorestoretheirlegitimatenationalrights,andsupportsPalestineinbuildinganindependentandfullysovereignstateonthebasisofthe1967bordersandwithEastJerusalemasitscapital.ChinaisreadytotirelesslyworkwiththeinternationalcommunitytopushforwardPalestine-Israelpeacetalksandstriveforanearlyrealizationofcomprehensive,justandsustainedpeaceintheMiddleEast,Xiadded.TheInternationalDayofSolidaritywiththePalestinianPeopleisaUN-organizedobservancepursuanttotheUNGeneralAssemblyResolution32/40BofDec2,1977.ItisnormallyheldonNov29eachyeartomarktheadoptionbytheUNGeneralAssemblyofResolution181(II)onNov29,1947,partitioningthemandateofPalestineintotwostates.ThatresolutionprovidedfortheestablishmentinPalestineofa"Jewishstate"andan"Arabstate",withJerusalemunderaspecialinternationalregime.Ofthetwostatestobecreatedunderthisresolution,onlyone,Israel,hasbeenfullyrealized.&nbsp;(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.RelatedreadingXiofferscongratulationsonobservanceofint'ldayofsolidaritywithPalestinianpeoplePalestineslamsTrump'srecognitionofIsrael'ssovereigntyoverGolanas&quot;boosttocolonialism&quot;WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline
