Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline

Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChine Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;-People'sDailyOnlineFriday,Nov29,2019SearchArchiveChineseChineseJapaneseFrenchSpanishRussianArabicKoreanGermanPortugueseHomeOpinionsBusinessMilitaryWorldSocietyCultureTravelScienceSportsSpecialCoveragePhotoVideoEnglish&gt;&gt;Xinjianggov'tspokespersonslamsforeignmediaforhypingso-called&quot;leakeddocuments&quot;(Xinhua)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;07:09,November29,2019(GlobalTimes/Photo)URUMQI,Nov.28(Xinhua)--AspokespersonforthegovernmentofnorthwestChina'sXinjiangUygurAutonomousRegiononThursdaysaidtherecenthypingoffakenewsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizationsregardingtheso-called"leakeddocuments"onXinjiangisindisregardofthefactsandabsolutelyunacceptable.ThespokespersonissuedastatementontheregionalofficialTianshanwebsiterefutingrecentreportsbysomeforeignmediaandorganizations,inwhichtheyhypedtheso-called"internaldocuments"aboutXinjiangandslanderedanti-terrorismandde-radicalizationeffortsintheregion.ThespokespersonsaidthiskindofdisregardforthefactsanddenigrationofthearduouseffortsmadebypeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiangtoachievelong-termsocialstabilityshouldneverbeaccepted.Establishedinaccordancewiththelaw,Xinjiang'svocationaleducationandtrainingcentersarenot"concentrationcamps."Withnorestrictionordeprivationofpersonalfreedom,therightsofthestudentsinthecentersarefullyprotectedinaccordancewiththelaw,accordingtothespokesperson.TherehavebeennocasesofviolenceorterrorisminXinjiangforthreeyears,showingthepositiveeconomicdevelopment,socialstability,nationalunityandreligiousharmonyintheregion,saidthespokesperson.Thespokespersonsaidsincetheendoflastyear,morethan1,000peoplefromover90countriesandregionshadvisitedthecenters,andmediafromhomeandabroadhavealsoreportedontherealityofthesituation.IthasbeenwidelyacknowledgedthatXinjiang'seducationandtrainingcentersfullyconformtothepurposesandprinciplesoftheUnitedNationsinpreventingandcombatingterrorismandsafeguardingbasichumanrights,andareworthyoffullrecognitionandstudy,accordingtothespokesperson.Chinaisacountryundertheruleoflawandhasacompletejudicialprocess,thespokespersonsaid,addingthatthejudicialorgansofXinjiangactinstrictaccordancewithlawsandregulations.Theydealwithpersonssuspectedofbreakingthelawandcommittingcrimesaccordingtothenatureandcircumstancesoftheirillegalacts.TheChinesegovernmentprotectsthelawfulrightsofforeignnationalsinChinaandnopeopleotherthanChinesenationalshasreceivedtrainingatthecenters.ThefreedomsofcommunicationandprivacyofChinesecitizensareprotectedbylawandthereisnomonitoringorrestrictingofcommunicationsintheregion,accordingtothespokesperson.PracticehasprovedthatthefightagainstterrorisminaccordancewiththelawhasmettheardentexpectationsofthepeopleofallethnicgroupsinXinjiang,hasstronglysafeguardedoverallsocialharmonyandstability,andsignificantlyincreasedthepeople'ssenseofgain,happinessandsecurity,accordingtothespokesperson."WewillcontinuetoeffectivelyrunourownaffairsanddevelopXinjiang,andwillworkhardtopromotesocialstabilityandlastingpeaceintheregion,"thespokespersonsaid.(ForthelatestChinanews,PleasefollowPeople'sDailyonTwitterandFacebook)(Webeditor:Liang&nbsp;Jun,Bianji)AddyourcommentPleaseenableJavaScripttoviewthecommentspoweredbyDisqus.WeRecommendSiberiantigersplayinsnowinNEChinaAutumnsceneryinVermont,U.S.MuseumshowscultureofSuipeopleForbiddenCityoffersupitssecretsHiIamChina:diversifiedGansuScubaClausDiveheldinVancouverLonghuwetlandineastChina'sShandongChristmasLightseventheldinHelsinkiInpics:nighteconomyinShanghaiMostRead1WhyisChinaslum-free?2Changsha-CitythatNeverSleeps3USHongKongbillnothingbutavainattempttointerferei…4Commentary:LionRockSpiritneededforHongKongtostopv…5HowWesternmediapaintsaprostitutionsolicitorasapoli…Top10Top10citieswhereChina's'richfamilies'liveWorld'stop10countriesandregionsinpatentapplicationsTop10ChineseuniversitiesdrawingmostcashChina'stop10internetcompaniesin2019PopularonGlobalTimesNointerferenceinVenezuelanissuesBizpreparesfortradespatBroadcastingContinentAustraliawinsChineseCEOsasUSlosesHotNewsChinese,U.S.chieftradenegotiatorsholdphonetalksChina-RussiatiesatcenterofChinesediplomacy:deputyFMChinareleasesarticleongenderdiscriminationinU.S.Changsha-CitythatNeverSleepsHereishow5GwillchangethefutureChinesediplomatrejectsU.S.allegationsagainstPakistanprojectKeyWordsXiJinpingBeltandRoadG20SouthChinaSeaAIIBLinks:BeijingTodayCRIEnglishSINAEnglishGlobalTimesChinadaily.com.cnTaiwan.cnEcns.cnShowChinaChinaHumanRightsChinaXinjiangTibetOnlineCCTVBeijingReviewGMW.cnChinaEconomicNetChinaTibetOnlineQiushiJournalWomenofChinaConsulateGeneralinNewYorkAboutPeople'sDailyOnline|JoinUs|ContactUspeople.cn©People'sDailyOnline
